name: Obliterator
storyline:
You are Drak the Last of the Obliterators, a genetically enhaned and awesome fighting machine, bio-engineered for the execution of a incredible task, the ultimate solution ot thme most cataclysmic of predicaments.

In the voids of Federation space an alien cruiser has materialised. It is aship of sinister and foreboding power. Federation defences have been smashed, Earth lies exposed, then is only one hope and you are it!

Summoned by the Federation, your assignment is to use a prototype matter transporter to infiltrate the alien cruiser. Armed with a particle beam disrupter, lasers and whatever the alien habitat can provide, you musst cripple the alien vessel thus enabling its destruction.

What awaits? What technoloigcal perils and strange diabolica adversaries will try to thwart yo in your mission?
